DataElement.preferredName: Erythrocyte Blood Transfusion Less Than Integer::30 Days Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not RBC transfusions were administered in the prior 30 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Erythrocyte Blood Transfusion Less Than Integer::30 Days Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm and little else; biconcave, anucleate discs, 7nm diameter in mammals._The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Red blood cells. Mature erythrocytes are non-nucleated, biconcave disks containing hemoglobin whose function is to transport oxygen.:The administration of blood or blood products into a blood vessel.

Concepts.definition: A blood cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm. They are biconcave, anucleate discs, with a 6-8um diameter in humans.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part.::30:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:Given.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
